ingest-processing.validation: Yes. Format validation is based on the rules described in Section 1.13of CSV Action Plan Background.
ingest-processing.characterization: Yes. Extracted format metadata are described in Section 2.1 of CSV Action Plan Background.

significant-properties.content: The content of cell data and the optional CSV header will be preserved.
significant-properties.context: N/A. CSV does not provide a metadata scheme to describe the environment on which a CSV was originally created or used.
significant-properties.behavior: N/A. CSV does not contain interactive characteristics such as hyperlinks.
significant-properties.structure: The structural elements of a CSV, including rows and columns, will be preserved.
significant-properties.appearance: N/A. CSV does not store appearance attributes such as font (including font size or font style), color, alignment, etc.

long-term-strategy.original: Migrate to a successor format that is open, standardized and formally documented.

action-plan.note: “From digital volatility to digital permanence, Preserving spreadsheets”, Jacqueline Slats, The Hague, November 2003, http://www.digitaleduurzaamheid.nl/bibliotheek/docs/volatility-permanence-spreadsh-en. pdf
